short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fox wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Fox background. Fox wallpaper background theme for animal fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab greets you with a fresh Fox wallpaper.
2. Cycle through random Fox backgrounds or pin your favorite in the wallpaper picker.
3. Integrated Google Search Bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media platforms.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. Create new notes for task reminders.
7. Quick navigation to frequently visited sites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarked pages.
9. Shortcut panel customization for rapid website access.
10. Instant connection to Google applications.
11. Quick access to additional themes.
12. Effortless social media sharing.
13. Fast track to downloading wallpapers.
14. Immediate entry to online gaming.
15. Activate entertaining animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, and fireworks on the Fox new tab page.
